column4: my laptop just powered down without notice. how can i find out what happened?
seriously: was it running on battery and batt went dead?
I'd put my money on a hardware issue
or was the laptop sitting idle when it happened?
i just got it replaced from the factory :(
no, i was watching something on flash and instant messaging
how about putting any Linux cd in it, boot from it, and run a mem test? those are nice 'n lengthy, and make the system work
i've done that once already (i don't trust cheap ram). do you think that it would change anything, other than heating it up?
nope, mem-test won't affect hardware or software
i meant, would you think that my ram might have gone bad since the test
It could be. Any hardware can fail, however, mem-test would not have CAUSED it to become bad
well, i guess i'll be gone for a bit. i'm really unhappy with hp laptops
